name: Puddle Escape
description:
Help Andy  Toads to escape from the puddles.

Click on the leaves to alter the direction of the frog when it bounces. Redirect to frog to the star and the stage will be clear! (up to 8 levels) You have limited time to complete each stage.

You can also select and change the position of the leaf with WASD.

R allows you to restart the level.
